DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of the vital signs measurement represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2021-6-8 ak 12 Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 11/18/18 TT released/MC.  11-19-18 TT changed max length. 11/9/18 TT changed Data Type from Character to Date and added Max Length for NCI Implementation of the standard. ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the date of the vita
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the date of the vital signs measurement?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record date of measurements using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: VSDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable VSDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date of measurement can be determined from a collected date of visit (VISDAT) and in such cases a separate measurement date field is not required.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2829808 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Template Text
What was the date of the vital signs measurement?
